title: Interpretation of dreams that I called my wife about Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was having sex with my wife. Seeing a husband in a dream having sexual intercourse with his wife most often symbolizes promising signs and a sign of happiness and joy. Sometimes the vision can indicate sadness and some unexpected signs, and this depends on the dreamer’s condition and what he feels. The dream and in the following article we will learn in detail about the balance of these interpretations. I dreamed that I was having sex with my wife. Seeing someone having sex with his wife in a dream symbolizes kindness and a good relationship between him and his wife and the stability of their marital life. Also, seeing a husband having sex with his wife in a dream is evidence of satisfaction and closeness. Plenty of sustenance, God willing. A man’s dream of having intercourse with his wife in a dream indicates a high position that he will obtain soon or a new job. Seeing a wife in a dream means good health and recovery from all diseases that the person was suffering from. Seeing a wife in a dream symbolizes She will give birth soon, God willing. I dreamed that I was in contact with my wife about Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing someone having sex with his wife in a dream as evidence of kindness and pleasant skin that you will hear about soon. Seeing a married man in a dream having sex with his wife indicates stability and improvement. Their lives for the better in the coming period. Seeing a husband having sex with his wife in a dream symbolizes abundance of money and success at work. Also, seeing a husband marrying his wife in a dream indicates the good reputation he enjoys among those around him. Seeing sexual intercourse with his wife in a dream symbolizes getting closer. From God and staying away from sins. Seeing a husband in a dream having sex with his wife is a sign that he takes full responsibility for his home and meets all their needs. I dreamed that I had intercourse with my wife and did not ejaculate. Seeing someone having sex with his wife without ejaculating in a dream symbolizes some inappropriate decisions Which he will take in the coming period. Also, seeing his wife in a dream without ejaculation is a sign of exhaustion, exhaustion, and the bad psychological state that the dreamer is going through in this period of his life. Seeing the dreamer having intercourse with his wife without ejaculation symbolizes failure and the inability to achieve the goals that he planned. For her for a long time. Seeing the dreamer in a dream indicates intercourse with his wife and it did not result in his inability to solve the problems and crises that she faced. I dreamed that I had intercourse with my wife and she was in her menstrual period. Seeing a husband having sex with his wife in a dream while she was in her menstrual period symbolizes unfavorable signs and life. The unstable situation that the husband lives in. Seeing a husband in a dream having intercourse with his wife during her menstrual period indicates the problems and crises that exist between them and cannot be resolved. Seeing a husband in a dream having sexual intercourse with his wife during her menstruation indicates his distance from God and his committing his sins and misdeeds, and the dream may be a warning. For him to get closer to God. Attending a wedding to have intercourse with his wife while she is menstruating is a sign that they are doing forbidden things and only following their desires. I dreamed that I had intercourse with my wife in front of her family. Any person’s dream is to have sex with his wife.

title: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dreamBlood is one of the things that many people worry about and search for. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream. What are the most important indications of this through the interpretation of major scholars such as Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi and others. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Many scholars presented the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream in detail, This is different for women, men, single girls, pregnant women, and today through the site Different, we provide you with all the interpretations related to seeing blood in a dream. Whoever sees blood in a dream is a sign of forbidden money that the dreamer will gain in those days. If one sees that he is bleeding, this is a sign of pain that he is suffering A lot at that time. The interpretation of seeing blood in a dream on clothes is a sign of the person who wants to take revenge on him at that moment. Anyone who dreams of blood on the bed is a sign of major marital problems that the dreamer faces during those days. Seeing blood stains in the bathroom indicates stress The dangerous psychological condition that the dreamer suffers from during those days. Bleeding from the wall or blood flow is an indication of a major problem that the dreamer will fall into during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that someone is bleeding, this is an indication of the serious difficulties that the dreamer faced at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation A dream about blood according to Nabul: The interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming out of the mouth in large quantities is an indication of the intense fear that the dreamer felt in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that blood is coming out of him in large quantities is an indication of serious problems and difficulties that the dreamer is going through at that time. A woman’s dream of blood coming out of her mouth and falling to the ground is a sign that her death is near and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is bleeding from her mouth, this is evidence of serious marital problems that she was suffering from at that time. Blood What comes out of the mouth in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she is a gossip that speaks ill of others. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream Coming out of the body in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she will suffer a serious financial loss during that period. If a divorced woman sees blood coming out of the mouth, it indicates On her intimate husband at that time, and God knows best. When a widow sees blood bleeding from her mouth, this is evidence of her marriage to a very righteous sheikh in those days, and God knows best. The blood that comes out of the body in a dream is a sign of getting rid of anxiety and ending sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about blood in A pregnant woman’s dream: If a pregnant woman sees blood bleeding from her mouth, this is a sign that she has given birth to a child, a memory of God knows best. If a woman sees blood bleeding from her, this is a sign that she will have a miscarriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about blood in an unmarried girl’s dream. If an unmarried girl sees blood bleeding from her This indicates her closeness, God willing. Whoever sees in her dream that drops of blood are coming out of her indicates her marriage to a very good young man at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream about good and evil by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a girl in a dream? A question that many who have seen this dream in the past, whether seeing a familiar or unknown girl, would like to know the answer. Seeing people is the most common vision in the world of dreams, whether it is family, friends, or others that we have not seen before, and some dreamers believe that seeing a girl in a dream conveys hidden messages to him that make him feel curious about the consequences of this vision. Sometimes visions carry many ambiguous meanings that need to be interpreted by superior jurists who are able to translate dream symbols according to his or her own condition and according to the dreamer’s condition, whether he is single or married. So what do dream interpreters say about seeing a girl in a dream? We will show you this through the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream in psychology. One of the most famous psychologists who is interested in dreams is the famous scientist “Freud”, but psychiatrists in general do not interpret dreams. They refer to the person’s state and mood at the time of the dream, so the symbolism of the dream differs from each person. On the other hand, seeing a girl in a dream for a man is not the same as the girl and her age varies. He can also examine the details of her appearance, clothing, age, or the situation in which the girl appeared in the dream to the patient. Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a girl in a dream according to Ibn Sirin in his book “Dreams” “. If she is young, it generally symbolizes: Joy comes to you, fills you with happiness and opens the doors of livelihood. If the little girl looks miserable and in a neglected and bad condition, it is a harbinger of an upcoming difficult situation, fears and misfortunes, and is not a good sign for the dreamer. But if the little girl is beautiful And she is cared for, kind and beautiful, then this is a sign of goodness and blessings in the family, money and children. If he sees a young girl with strange and ugly eyes, this is a problem that portends bad. Seeing a young girl crying and crying in a dream is a sign of the imminent death of someone she loves and the accumulation of debts, and God knows best. Dream interpretation jurists have indicated Until the vision of a girl in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that express goodness, abundance of livelihood, and the arrival of happiness to the dreamer. This vision indicates an increase in money, as it indicates the acquisition of an inheritance, and God knows best. The meaning of a girl in a dream If the dreamer dreams of seeing a girl crying in a dream, this is an indication On the difficult period that the dreamer is going through in reality, which is full of many crises that he faces. This vision symbolizes progress and success academically and professionally, as it expresses promotion at work. A girl’s vision of a married man portends success at work and the birth of a child soon, and God knows best. As for the meaning of this dream For a single man, it is marriage to a girl of good character in reality. Seeing a young girl in a dream means that he will earn a lot of money at work and good news for the dreamer who seeks to achieve excellence in studies. Seeing a young girl in a dream is one of the most promising dreams for the dreamer, especially if She looked beautiful to the dreamer. When you dream of seeing a baby crying in a dream, this is an unfavorable sign for the dreamer and indicates that he is going through a financial crisis and receiving bad news.

title: Interpretation of seeing a ruler in a dream by senior scholars

preview.html: Seeing a ruler in a dream is one of the dreams that carry many interpretations and meanings and is considered a double-edged sword. Some of them symbolize broad nutrition and goodness, and others indicate diseases or problems and obstacles that the dreamer will face in his life. The ruler can be a source of good and can be a source of evil. Seeing the ruler in a dream Dreaming of the ruler in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will reach a high position in society and will have a good position that allows him to live in a stable way. Seeing the ruler in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s wisdom in reality and his ability to act rationally with the problems he faces. Dreaming of a ruler is a sign that the dreamer will achieve his desired goals and dreams and will excel in his life. Seeing a ruler in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a ruler in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be able to defeat enemies and get rid of them quickly without Exposure to any kind of harm. The ruler in a dream may symbolize that during the following period the dreamer may be exposed to serious injustice or persecution by a person of higher authority than him. Whoever sees in his dream the ruler with good appearance and body, this indicates the dreamer’s ability in reality to manage his life and dispose of it. All things are rational. Seeing the ruler in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq. Dreaming of the ruler with Imam Al-Sadiq is good news about the goodness and livelihood that the dreamer will receive during the coming period and his ability to achieve many successes. Seeing the ruler in a dream means that the dreamer will be able to get rid of his enemies and will be in a state of happiness. And power. If a person sees a ruler in a dream, it foretells that he will soon reach a prominent position, through which he will achieve many achievements. Seeing a ruler in a single woman’s dream. A ruler in a dream about an unmarried girl and seeing her bow in front of him indicates that in reality she is subject to some judgments and pressures that are considered... Stronger than her and she cannot control and control her. Seeing a ruler in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign that she will marry in a short time a man who holds a position and a great position in society and has good qualities that satisfy her. If an unmarried woman sees a ruler in her dream, this means that she She will reach a good position in the future, which may be finding a good job that suits her and makes her happy. The ruler’s dream of a virgin girl wearing something valuable is an indication that in reality she will obtain many benefits that will put her in another state of happiness and pleasure. Seeing the ruler in a dream for a married woman indicates A ruler in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will reach a great and advanced position that will make her distinguished among her family and friends, and she will be extremely happy. Seeing a ruler in a married woman’s dream or a sultan, the vision may mean that her death is approaching and that she will die soon. If a married woman sees a ruler in her dream, this indicates The extent of compatibility and love that exists between her and her husband in reality, and this makes her live a stable life. The dream of a ruler in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she will soon be able to achieve all the things that she has always wanted

title: Interpretation of a dream about feeding a dead person in a dream and interpretation of a dream about feeding a dead person according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead in a dream. Dream landmarks are the only link between us and the dead. They may convey to us a message from our loved ones or warn us of a great danger. However, the interpretation of the dream is that we feed the dead in a dream. It may arouse in our souls a desire to approach them and eat with them. Is this a bad omen? Or a message of goodness and love, and what is the preferred type of food, and what is the meaning of each type, whether it is pleasant or unpleasant. What is the interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead in a dream? The interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead indicates different interpretations of the deceased himself or of the visions, depending on the personality of the deceased himself and the type The food he eats in a dream. If the deceased is a relative of the dreamer, then this is a message to the dreamer, who should listen carefully to his conversation while eating food. But if the deceased is unknown or anonymous, this means that the dreamer is committing some bad deeds or is walking on a path that carries a lot of Suspicions harm his reputation and he needs to stop for a while to reconsider himself. If the deceased asks for certain types of food, this indicates that he committed bad deeds for which he is currently being held accountable, and he may need alms or begging from the dreamer to relieve him of his torment. But if the deceased was a major politician, this is a sign However, the fortuneteller will soon obtain a prestigious job and an excellent position. If she is an ancient historical figure, this indicates the multiplicity of blessings, courage, and blessings that the dreamer will enjoy in the future. While the dreamer who sees the corpse refuses to eat and leaves it, he must inquire about his exact source of livelihood. And knowing the source from which he derives his livelihood. Feeding the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that this vision can have many connotations and interpretations, depending on various factors such as the personality of the dead person who is being fed, his relationship with God, and the type of food he eats: If the deceased who is being fed A man, this indicates that many changes will occur in the life of the dreamer in the coming period. But if it is an unknown woman, this is a sign of good health and physical and physical condition that allows him to live a normal life and carry out many activities. While a person who has A degree of closeness with the viewer. This may mean that the viewer is about to start a new business project that will bring him a lot of profits and gains. But if you eat with him, this may indicate the end of a quarrel between two lovers who have been apart for a long time. To get the correct interpretation, conduct research. On Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. What is the interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead in a dream for a single woman. If the deceased was dear to her, then this vision indicates that she is facing many difficulties at the present time and is in dire need of help, and perhaps she should Talk to her mother or older sister and listen to their advice. But if he sees that he is eating many different delicious things with him, this is a sign that he will survive this big problem that he faces in the past.
